Description: S Pietro in Vincola, Rome; the walls of the church with apse and gabled belfry at l, figures on the road leading into the distance at r Pen and brown ink, with grey and brown wash
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (14)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
